title:
Folding Cover, Drive Shaft, Transmission Side,
Replace

steps.text: Remove relevant drive shaft from vehicle - see operation “Drive Shaft, Remove and Install”
Secure drive shaft in soft jaw vice
Remove constant velocity joint from drive shaft

substeps.text: Using suitable tool, remove circlip (1) from outer race of
Slide bearing cage clear of inner race
Remove bearing inner race and bearing cage from drive shaft

steps.text: Remove, then discard folding cover from drive shaft
Install new folding cover to drive shaft

substeps.text: Position new folding cover retaining clip to drive shaft

steps.text: Install bearing cage, then inner bearing race to drive shaft

substeps.text: Install new circlip to drive shaft

steps.text: Install 6x ball bearing to inner race and bearing cage

substeps.text: Install new circlip to outer race

steps.text: Install folding cover to groove on drive shaft and groove on constant velocity joint

substeps.text: Check positioning of folding cover and 2x retaining clip

steps.text: Install drive shafts to vehicle - see operation “Drive Shaft, Remove and Install, Both Sides

warnings:
Use specified grease
for constant velocity joint.
notes:

 Install bearing
cage with groove away from drive shaft.
 Note:   Install bearing
inner race with flattened spline towards driveshaft.
